divs: Sighting Detailsit all started approximately one to one and a half years prior i was sitting on back porch and noticed a light just hovering under the clouds but thought nothing of it. but i what cought my attention was when it was back the next day it was really bright and seemed to be alot lower then the stars it was always there i started to notice that it didn't follow the same flight pattern of the stars what i mean the stars that would be next to would move with time while this light would get furthe and further away in the same amount of time i watched it for a few more days when i thought to get the video camera out and record it. what igot when i zoomed in was a light with a sphere that kind of moved slightly.but the odd thing was it had an x going threw it so i focused on a star next to it and zoomed in and it had no similarities. i would watch it out of my window and one night i was saying in my head i know your there well it appeared 3 times in a week. my two sons saw it for themselves too
trends: There has been one other sighting in Metuchen
There was one other sighting in Metuchen on or around July 25th 2008
